Calculate scores for effective impervious area (EIA)

Source: R/eia.R
assess_eia.Rd

Calculate scores for effective impervious area (EIA)

Usage

assess_eia()

Value

List of 2 dataframes: summary and score.

Examples

assess_eia()
#> $summary
